text.section: The purpose of the Kentucky Long-Term Policy Research Center is to serve as a catalyst to change the way decisions are made in government by providing decision-makers a broader context in which to make decisions, taking into consideration the long-term implications of policy, critical trends, and emerging issues which may have a significant impact on the state.

law.history: Amended 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 136, sec. 2, effective June 21, 2001. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 103, sec. 6, effective July 14, 1992.
